definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: Upon their marriage, the title Duke of Edinburgh was created for him.
sentences.chinese: 婚后，他被授予爱丁堡公爵的爵位。

sentences.english: The novel is set in Edinburgh and the Lothians at the time of the Napoleonic Wars.
sentences.chinese: 小说的场景设置在爱丁堡和拿破仑战争时期的锡兰。

sentences.english: The London to Edinburgh express steamed into Newcastle fight on time.
sentences.chinese: 从伦敦到爱丁堡的快车准时驶抵纽卡斯尔。

sentences.english: The Queen and The Duke of Edinburgh have been married for 54 years. They were married on November 20, 1947 in Westminster Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 女王与爱丁堡公爵结婚54年。

sentences.english: Watched sunset in Edinburgh with best friend.
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的日落，跟张夏一起看的。

sentences.english: They stopped off overnight in Edinburgh .
sentences.chinese: 他们中途在爱丁堡停留过夜。

sentences.english: When it premiered at this year's Edinburgh film festival, I paid for Vanessa to fly over.
sentences.chinese: 在爱丁堡电影节首映的时候，我邀请了瓦妮莎参加。

sentences.english: Lights brighten Scotland's capital city, Edinburgh, at twilight.
sentences.chinese: 灯光照亮了在黄昏时的苏格兰首府爱丁堡。

sentences.english: I sang and danced in town, and then went to bed in Edinburgh Castle.
sentences.chinese: 我在镇上又唱又跳，然后就睡在了爱丁堡城里。

sentences.english: Bothwell and I rode back to Edinburgh with the army.
sentences.chinese: 博思韦尔和我率领着军队驱马回到爱丁堡。

sentences.english: Now in Edinburg , only 20 miles from the Mexican bordor.
sentences.chinese: 目前在爱丁堡，离墨西哥只有20英里。

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Pathology , The University of Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 这是爱丁堡大学病理学系的网站。

sentences.english: Hume had a house in Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 休谟在爱丁堡有一座房子。

sentences.english: This is the website for The Institute for Stem Cell Research, The University of Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 这是爱丁堡大学干细胞研究所的网站。

sentences.english: Edinburgh city is small, narrow streets, ancient buildings.
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的古城很小，窄的街道，古老的建筑。

sentences.english: Did I not tell you he had returned to Edinburgh?
sentences.chinese: 我没告诉过你他刚回到爱丁堡吗？

definition: Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia
Manchester/also written 曼徹斯特|曼彻斯特
